questions.title: Where can I input my billing information?
questions.answer: Navigate to the panel, go to your Account settings and then look for Billing Information tab. You will find there a form to fill in.

questions.title: Are there custom plans available?
questions.answer: Yes, we're offering custom plans. We recommend using our [configurator form](https://panel.patchkit.net/pricing.html) or contacting us directly by [email](mailto:contact@patchkit.net)
